name: BetaQuestGame
body:
### **Welcome to The Beta Quest Download Site.**


### What is Beta Quest?
**Beta Quest** is a multi-genre indie game created by professional shitposter NopeCartoons. The game has you play as a lonely hooded adventurer determined to make his mark on a world that's ever so crumbling around him. 

(*This game is filled with shit references to much better games, like the reference to* **Ticket** *seen above.*)

### If it's so bad, why should I play this game?
I don't really know why. Maybe if you like playing bad games, or just seeing what it has to offer. I wanted to put the game online just to see what happens, what people think of this pile of **TRASH**. It also proves Canadian and American humor is very different.  

### Download Links

No versions available.

### Credits 
Pretty much just me at the moment.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
